attributes.action: Bring back the Death Penalty For Convicted Peadophiles,Rapists and Child Killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The death penalty for all peadophiles,rapists and child killers who and have been found guilty by a jury in A court of law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
